about_the_game:
Mana Valley is an open-world RPG.

A curse has moved over Mana Valley turning once friendly creatures into vicious adversaries. As a novice witch, you must hone your skills in magic to find and defeat the evil plaguing the land.

Features
  • Level up. Gain experience by defeating enemies and farming. Every level-up you'll receive points that you can use in a spellbook to improve stats and become stronger.

  • A custom experience. Use hundred of items to personalize your character's look and home. Explore a vast open world at your own pace on your own timeline.

  • Farming. Plant seeds and nurture them into mature crops & herbs. Harvest them to use in powerful alchemy spells, sell to vendors, or decorate.

  • Building. Use resources that you find and harvest to create a shelter that you can improve over time into a home.

  • Conjuring/Crafting. Combine hundreds of resources into new and useful items that will help you on your journey.
